Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: It would be good if you could document that we need to return here as otherwise the network is considered “down”. You mentioned that in your email, but neither in the commit message, nor in the comment.

Comment: Can you please make the commit message a bit more meaningful? E.g. “wifi: properly display ad-hoc networks” and mention in the long description that no statistics are displayed since none are available.
